content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Broken Ribs Normal damage. The target is slowed 1 until healed. Bludgeoning
Spinal Tap Normal damage. The target is sickened 3. Piercing
Never Slice The target is slowed 2 for 1 round. Slashing
Forceful Blast The bomb or spell deals and additional 1d8 force damage. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #33
